_meta.description: Complete Penance card database v3.0 - Alpha Playtest Ready

universal.name: Desperate Lunge
universal.effect: Move up to 2 hexes in any direction. You may rotate once during movement. Generate 1 Heat.

universal.name: Warden's Pivot
universal.effect: Rotate to any facing (no limit). Free action - does not cost SP.

universal.name: Ironstrider's Rush
universal.effect: Move up to 3 hexes in straight line. Ignore difficult terrain. Generate 2 Heat.

universal.name: Unyielding Bulwark
universal.effect: Play when targeted by attack. Reduce damage by 2 (minimum 1). Discard this card after use.

universal.name: Second Skin
universal.effect: Play when targeted by attack. Reduce damage by 1 (minimum 1). Discard this card after use.

universal.name: Field Suture
universal.effect: Remove 1 Damage card from target's discard pile from the game. Can target self or adjacent ally.

universal.name: Tattered Hope
universal.effect: Discard your entire hand. Draw 3 cards. Use when desperate or hand is bad.

universal.name: Guardian's Defiance
universal.effect: +2 Defense until your next turn. You may cover adjacent ally (redirect 1 attack to yourself).

church.name: Blood Offering
church.effect: Discard 2 cards from top of your deck (self-harm). Your next attack this turn: +3 damage, ignores 1 Defense, and -1 to target number (easier to hit).

church.name: Martyrdom Protocol
church.effect: When an ally within 2 hexes would take damage, redirect that damage to yourself instead. Gain 1 Heat.

church.name: Righteous Fury
church.effect: Each time an allied Casket is destroyed this mission, gain +1 damage to all attacks permanently for the rest of the mission (stacks).

church.name: Consecrated Ground
church.effect: Create a 3-hex radius healing zone centered on you until end of round. Allied Caskets in this zone recover 2 cards from discard pile at start of their turn.

church.name: Last Rites
church.effect: When an allied Casket within 3 hexes is destroyed (deck reaches 0), immediately recover 5 cards from your discard pile and draw 2 cards.

church.name: Righteous Wrath
church.effect: Deal 5 damage. This attack cannot miss. If target has killed an ally this mission, deal 7 damage instead.

church.name: Divine Judgment
church.effect: Deal 8 damage, ignore 1 Defense. On Miss: Recover 2 SP and gain 'Judgment Delayed' (+3 damage to next attack).

church.name: Flagellant's Zeal
church.effect: Gain 5 SP immediately. Can only be used once per mission. Gain 2 Heat.

church.name: Absolution
church.effect: Remove 3 Heat. Recover 3 cards from discard pile to deck (shuffle). Absolve your sins.

church.name: Chains of Penance
church.effect: Deal 4 damage. Target cannot move until end of their next turn. Discard 1 card from your deck (self-harm).

dwarves.name: Crushing Blow
dwarves.effect: Deal 4 damage. ARMOR PIERCING (ignore all Defense buffs and armor).

dwarves.name: Forge Fury
dwarves.effect: Deal 3 damage + 1 damage per Heat you currently have (max +6). Remove all Heat after attack resolves.

dwarves.name: Rune of Protection
dwarves.effect: Gain 1 Rune Counter. While you have Rune Counters, reduce all damage by 1 per counter (max 3 counters). Duration: Until end of mission or destroyed.

dwarves.name: Unbreakable
dwarves.effect: When you would take Component Damage, prevent 1 Component Damage. Gain 1 Heat.

dwarves.name: Earthshaker
dwarves.effect: Deal 5 damage to primary target. All adjacent enemies take 2 damage and are pushed 1 hex away.

dwarves.name: Clan Vengeance
dwarves.effect: Each time you take Component Damage, your next attack deals +2 damage. This bonus stacks (3 Component Damage = +6 damage on next attack).

dwarves.name: Ironborn Resilience
dwarves.effect: Passive: The first Component Damage you take each round is ignored. You are Ironborn.

dwarves.name: Mountain Stance
dwarves.effect: Gain +3 Defense until your next turn. You cannot move while in Mountain Stance. Immovable as stone.

dwarves.name: Grudge Bearer
dwarves.effect: Passive: Mark enemies who damage you. Attacks against marked enemies deal +2 damage. The grudge is eternal.

dwarves.name: Ancestor Ward
dwarves.effect: When you would take lethal damage (deck would reach 0), prevent up to 5 damage. Once per mission. The ancestors protect.

ossuarium.name: Soul Harvest
ossuarium.effect: Deal 4 damage. Recover cards equal to damage dealt from your discard pile (max 4 cards).

ossuarium.name: Corpse Fuel
ossuarium.effect: When an enemy Casket is destroyed within 3 hexes, immediately recover 5 cards from your discard pile and shuffle into deck.

ossuarium.name: Phylactery
ossuarium.effect: The first time each mission you would be reduced to 0 HP, instead set HP to 5 (recover 5 cards from discard pile). This is automatic and costs nothing.

ossuarium.name: Bone Scythe Reap
ossuarium.effect: Deal 3 damage to primary target and 2 damage to all adjacent enemies. Recover 1 card from discard pile per enemy damaged (max 4 cards).

ossuarium.name: Deathless Advance
ossuarium.effect: Move up to 3 hexes. Until end of your turn, you cannot take more than 5 damage from any single attack (damage cap).

ossuarium.name: Necrotic Surge
ossuarium.effect: Whenever you recover cards from discard pile (via any effect), recover +1 additional card.

elves.name: Thorn Strike
elves.effect: Deal 3 damage. Apply Bleed 2 (target takes 2 damage at start of their next turn).

elves.name: Pruning Cut
elves.effect: Deal 4 damage to specific component (you choose: Right Arm, Left Arm, Legs, Head, Chassis). If target discards cards from that component type, deal +2 Component Damage.

elves.name: Root Bind
elves.effect: Target enemy cannot move until end of their next turn. If they attempt to move, take 3 damage and Bleed 1.

elves.name: Photosynthesis
elves.effect: At end of your turn, if you did NOT attack this turn, recover 1 card from discard pile and remove 1 Heat.

elves.name: Leaf Dance
elves.effect: Move up to 3 hexes. You may make 1 attack during this movement (at any point). After attacking, you may continue moving.

elves.name: Verdant Regeneration
elves.effect: At the start of each round, recover 1 card from discard pile. If you have Living Seal equipped, recover 2 cards instead.

elves.name: Nature's Wrath
elves.effect: Deal 6 damage to target. All enemies adjacent to target take 2 damage. Nature answers the call.

elves.name: Wild Growth
elves.effect: Create difficult terrain in 3 adjacent hexes. Enemies moving through take 1 damage per hex. Lasts 2 rounds.

elves.name: Sylvan Step
elves.effect: Teleport up to 4 hexes. Must end in or adjacent to terrain. Once per turn. The forest guides you.

elves.name: Eternal Vigil
elves.effect: Passive: At the end of each round, if no enemies are within 3 hexes, recover 1 card from discard. The patient hunter endures.

equipment.name: Righteous Slash
equipment.effect: Deal 4 damage. +1 if target damaged this round.

equipment.name: Buckler Block
equipment.effect: Reactive: Reduce damage by 1, draw 1 card.

equipment.name: Earthquake
equipment.effect: 4 damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.

equipment.name: Bulwark
equipment.effect: Reactive: -2 damage to you and ally.

equipment.name: Opportunist Strike
equipment.effect: 5 damage if target moved this turn.

church.name: Divine Guidance
church.effect: Your next attack this turn: -2 to target number (easier to hit). If it hits, apply 'Blessed' status to target (all allies' attacks against this target: -1 to target number until end of round).

church.name: Martyrdom's Certainty
church.effect: Discard 1 card from deck. Your next attack cannot miss (auto-hit) but deals -2 damage.

church.name: Zealot's Focus
church.effect: Reroll 1 Attack Die on your next attack this turn.

taint_exploitation.name: Tainted Fury
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 2 Taint Markers: Your next attack this turn deals +2 damage. Gain 1 Heat.

taint_exploitation.name: Ignore Pain
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 3 Taint Markers: Reduce next damage taken by 3 (before Defense roll). Gain 1 Heat.

taint_exploitation.name: Void Step
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 1 Taint Marker: Move 2 hexes (costs 0 SP). Gain 1 Heat.

taint_exploitation.name: Exposed Weakness
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 1 enemy Taint Marker: Gain Advantage on your next attack against that enemy (roll 3 Attack Dice, take 2 highest).

taint_exploitation.name: Force Reroll
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 2 enemy Taint Markers: Force target to reroll up to 2 successful Defense Dice.

taint_exploitation.name: Heat Spike
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 1 enemy Taint Marker: Target gains +1 Heat immediately.

taint_exploitation.name: Taint Overload
taint_exploitation.effect: Spend 5 enemy Taint Markers: Target immediately flips 1 Pilot Wound card (neural feedback).

taint_exploitation.name: Flagellant's Zeal (Taint)
taint_exploitation.effect: Discard 3 cards (self-harm), gain 2 Taint Markers. Gain +2 SP this turn only (temporary burst).

taint_exploitation.name: Decay Aura
taint_exploitation.effect: Enemies within 3 hexes gain +1 Taint per turn (passive corruption radiation).

taint_exploitation.name: Regeneration Purge
taint_exploitation.effect: Recover 2 cards from discard pile. Remove 1 Taint Marker.

grit_related.name: Iron Will Training
grit_related.effect: Once per mission: When you would fail a Grit Check, reroll it. If you still fail, gain +1 Grit permanently (trauma builds character).

grit_related.name: Grit Your Teeth
grit_related.effect: When you take Pilot Damage: Add +2 to your Grit Check roll for this damage only.

grit_related.name: Martyr's Endurance
grit_related.effect: When you use Blood Offering or other self-harm Church cards: Gain +1 to your next Grit Check this mission.

grit_related.name: Stone Endurance Boost
grit_related.effect: Until end of mission: +1 to all Grit Checks (not just vs Severe Injuries). Gain 1 Heat.

support_units.name: Field Medic
support_units.effect: Support Unit (1 HP, 0 attack). Action: Adjacent ally recovers 2 cards from discard pile. Can be destroyed by AoE or targeted attacks.

support_units.name: Field Engineer
support_units.effect: Support Unit (1 HP, 0 attack). Action: Adjacent ally removes 2 Heat. Can be destroyed by AoE or targeted attacks.

support_units.name: Spotter
support_units.effect: Support Unit (1 HP, 0 attack). Passive: Allies within 6 hexes ignore Disadvantage from cover. Can be destroyed by AoE or targeted attacks.

support_units.name: Confessor
support_units.effect: Support Unit (2 HP, 0 attack). Passive: Allies within 2 hexes gain +1 to Grit Checks. Can redirect 1 attack per turn to self (martyr).

support_units.name: Forge Priest
support_units.effect: Support Unit (2 HP, 0 attack). Action: Adjacent ally gains 1 Rune Counter. Passive: Remove 1 Heat from adjacent allies at end of round.

support_units.name: Bone Servant
support_units.effect: Support Unit (1 HP, 1 attack). Action: Deal 1 damage to target. Passive: When destroyed, owner recovers 3 cards from discard.

support_units.name: Ent Sapling
support_units.effect: Support Unit (3 HP, 2 attack). Action: Deal 2 damage to adjacent enemy. Passive: Owner recovers 1 card at start of each round while Ent alive.

nomads.name: Ghost Step
nomads.effect: After making an attack, move up to 2 hexes (free action). Hit and run. Strike from shadows.

nomads.name: Survivor's Instinct
nomads.effect: Passive: When your deck has 15 cards or fewer, gain +1 SP maximum. Desperation fuels survival.

nomads.name: Scavenger's Cunning
nomads.effect: Draw 3 cards, then discard 2 cards of your choice. Dig for what you need.

nomads.name: Smoke and Mirrors
nomads.effect: Create smoke in your current hex. Blocks LOS. Move 2 hexes (does not break stealth). Vanish.

nomads.name: Opportunist
nomads.effect: Passive: Attacks against enemies who moved this turn deal +2 damage. Strike when vulnerable.

nomads.name: Desperate Gamble
nomads.effect: Discard 3 cards from deck. Your next attack deals +5 damage and ignores all Defense. All or nothing.

nomads.name: Wolves' Pact
nomads.effect: Passive: When adjacent to 2+ allies, gain +1 damage to all attacks. The pack hunts together.

nomads.name: Scrapper
nomads.effect: When you destroy an enemy Casket, immediately draw 2 cards and recover 2 cards from discard. Salvage the wreckage.

nomads.name: Feint and Strike
nomads.effect: Deal 5 damage. After attacking, move 1 hex. Quick, precise, gone.

nomads.name: Winds of Change
nomads.effect: Shuffle your discard pile back into your deck. Reset. Adapt. Survive.
